82348.summary: Some customers in Fort Saskatchewan are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82348.title: Aug 22 - Fort Saskatchewan | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

82357.summary: Some customers in the Dover Glen area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82357.title: Aug 22 - Calgary (Dover Glen) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
